This is an advanced version of the [[Transformation Technique]], where two or more users combine into one form in order to gain that form's physical abilities. Because there is more than one user involved, some of the prep work can be split between users, such as by having one provide the [[chakra]] while another performs the [[hand seal]]s.<ref name="c135">''Naruto'' chapter 135, pages 15-17</ref>

The Combination Transformations that have been seen in the series are:
*The [[Sound Four]] take the form of the [[Fourth Kazekage]]'s bodyguards, with two members in each guard.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 115, pages 4-7</ref>
*[[Gamabunta]] and [[Naruto Uzumaki]] take the form of a giant fox. In the anime, it is specifically the [[Nine-Tails]].<ref name="c135"/>
*[[Kiba Inuzuka]] and [[Akamaru]] take the form of a [[Double-Headed Wolf]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 203, pages 15-16</ref>
**Kiba, Akamaru, and one of Kiba's shadow clones take the form of a [[Three-Headed Wolf]]. Because there are three users, it's called a {{translation|"Mixture Transformation"|混合変化|Kongō Henge}}.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 633, page 2</ref>
*In the ''Naruto: Shippūden'' anime, the [[Magaki Group]] takes the form of [[Shiranami|their leader]].<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 149</ref>
*In the ''Boruto'' anime, Naruto and [[Sasuke Uchiha]] take the form of [[fūma shuriken]].<ref>''Boruto'' episode 65</ref>
